description: Located in the city of Santa Rosa this is a favorite biking, hiking, horse back riding are for the locals. Numerous routes through the park exist. The track marked here is a mix of fire road and single track with some moderately technical sections.
directions: From US101 travel east on CA 12. Continue through town as this becomes Farmer's Lane. Turn right at Montgomery Drive. Right on to Channel Drive and watch for signs fro Annadel State Park. Park along Channel drive on left or proceed to park parking lot and pay user fee.
title: Annadel Park Mtn bike
